p: In general, molds and yeasts are more tolerant against the action of plasma than bacteria, and vegetative cells are more sensitive than bacterial spores (Lee et al., 2006; Muranyi et al., 2007; Rowan et al., 2007; Hong et al., 2009; Shi et al., 2011; Kl√§mpfl et al., 2012; Tseng et al., 2012; Takamatsu et al., 2015). However, results obtained by numerous authors studying the effectiveness of NTAP under the same experimental conditions for a wide range of microbial groups have demonstrated that differences in NTAP resistance among these microbial groups are not as marked as those observed for thermal and other non-thermal processing technologies.
